alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 630 PM MST... At 538 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of New River, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Deer Valley Airport, Desert Ridge Marketplace and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 215 and 229. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 12 and 15. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 23 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
